title: Be careful boys
creator_credit: Biographic Cartoon Films, Oliver Lawson Dick, Vera Linnecar, Nancy Hanna and Keith Learner
brief_description: Charlie Burke is a wilfully careless handler of fruit, and is generally unpopular with his fellow workers, the foreman, the producers, the fruiterers and the housewives. A visit to a psychoanalyst reforms him. He acquires a conscience and becomes a model handler, self respecting and respected.
